definition: half/semi-/incomplete/(after a number) and a half
axis/axle/spool (for thread)/roller (for scrolls)/classifier for calligraphy rolls etc
see 壓軸戲|压轴戏[ya1 zhou4 xi4]/Taiwan pr. [zhou2]

sentences.english: A semi-major axis modified method is presented to compensate the influence of atmospheric perturbation.
sentences.chinese: 並提出一種補償大氣攝動影響的長半軸修正方法。

sentences.english: For the pinion shaft uses two pieces and mid-support, it improves the pinion strenght greatly.
sentences.chinese: 輸入軸採用半軸傳動中間支承，改善輸入軸的受力。

sentences.english: If an axle half-shaft should break , the truck's wheel will fall off.
sentences.chinese: 如果一個軸半軸應打破，小貨車的車輪會掉下來。

sentences.english: Precision mold and finished C. V. Joint, and the complete shaft.
sentences.chinese: 球籠式等速萬向節精鍛毛坯及成品和半軸總成。

sentences.english: Precision forming of automobile half-axle tubes is investigated by test.
sentences.chinese: 對汽車半軸套管的精密成形進行了試驗研究。

definition: computer numerical control machine tool (CNC machine tool)
balance (of a watch or clock)/balance wheel
network router/gateway (to Internet or between networks)
